useCase.name: Customer Gives Comment on a Dish

mainSequence.step: UI requests list of orders from Backend System
Backend fetches customer orders from Database
UI shows list of orders to Customer
Customer selects a dish from an order
UI requests dish details from Backend System
Backend fetches dish details from Database
Database returns dish details to Backend
Backend displays dish details on UI
UI shows dish details to Customer
Backend saves comment to dish in Database
Backend displays success message on UI
UI shows confirmation of comment submission to Customer
